text: Kottupullampalayam is a panchayat village in Gobichettipalayam taluk in Erode District of Tamil Nadu state, India. It is about 8 km from Gobichettipalayam and 45 km from district headquarters Erode. The village is located on the road connecting Gobichettipalayam with Sathyamangalam. Kottupullampalayam has a population of about 6197. ==References== Category:Villages in Erode district
title: Kottupullampalayam
